title: load_lua: ValueError: buffer size (x) must be a multiple of element size (y) -- w/ vgg16
body_html:
load_lua: ValueError: buffer size (53728077) must be a multiple of element size (4)

Enviornment:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch: pip & then conda
  • Python version: 2.7

Code:

from torch.utils.serialization import load_lua

...

if not os.path.exists(os.path.join(model_folder, 'vgg16.t7')):
            os.system(
                'wget http://cs.stanford.edu/people/jcjohns/fast-neural-style/models/vgg16.t7 -O ' + os.path.join(model_folder, 'vgg16.t7'))
        vgglua = load_lua(os.path.join(model_folder, 'vgg16.t7'))
        vgg = Vgg16()

Stacktrace:

File "/home/ubuntu/train/experiments/utils.py", line 100, in init_vgg16
    vgglua = load_lua(os.path.join(model_folder, 'vgg16.t7'))
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py", line 606, in load_lua
    return reader.read()
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py", line 591, in read
    return self.read_object()

    attributes = reader.read()
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py", line 593, in read
    return self.read_table()
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py", line 521, in wrapper
    result = fn(self, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/serialization/read_lua_file.py", line 570, in read_table
    v = self.read()

    v = self.read()

    return self.read_object()

    result = fn(self, *args, **kwargs)

ValueError: buffer size (53728077) must be a multiple of element size (4)
